name: console-plot
description: Draw graph based on X/Y data in console

scripts.test:esm: node test/esm/plotGraph.test.js && node test/esm/inputValidation.test.js && node test/esm/parameterSafety.test.js
scripts.test:cjs: node test/cjs/plotGraph.test.cjs && node test/cjs/inputValidation.test.cjs && node test/cjs/parameterSafety.test.cjs
scripts.test:ts: cd test && npm install && npx ts-node ts/plotGraph.test.ts && npx ts-node ts/inputValidation.test.ts && npx ts-node ts/parameterSafety.test.ts
scripts.test:installed:esm: cd test/installed && npm install && node esm/plotGraph.test.js
scripts.test:installed:cjs: cd test/installed && npm install && node cjs/plotGraph.test.cjs
scripts.test:installed:ts: cd test/installed && npm install && npx tsx ts/plotGraph.test.ts

author: Anton Bazhenov
